divs: sighting detailsmy niece was looking at her address on goggle map, street view and looked in the sky and said there was a flying saucer over her house-north west location. address is not hers , just a reference address date,time & duration is today's info, photo is not dated. goggle map-street view: 24222 new york dearborn mi- north west sky location http:\\maps.google.com\maps?ie=utf-8&hl=en&tab=wl there is a airport & fight path in the area, it is a sunny, bright day with a lot of glare & shinning in the photos that day. what makes it strange is: the shape of the object when you look from different streets (notre dame st-nw - different distance) (boston st.-west & smaller)) still staying in the same general direction. shape stays the same. when you search for it again a few more streets away (time) it is gone. i believe if it was was something on the liens, it would show up in different locations directions. there is probably a simple cause of this effect, i do not know what to tell her and just in case there is not a simple answer, it could be worth looking into. please keep me updated, thank you
Summary: Goggle Map-Street View: 24222 New York Dearborn MI- North West Sky Location
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Dearborn
